articles.description: A day after scoring six runs on seven straight hits in a victory and an inning after a controversial call left the game tied at 4, the Orioles put up another crooked number on Sunday to beat the Diamondbacks, 8-5, and win the road series.
articles.content:
PHOENIX — Innings like that can sink a team.
The Orioles led 4-2 to begin the fifth Sunday, but a questionable call by the umpiring crew sparked a game-tying rally by the Arizona Diamondbacks. Balti… [+7316 chars]
